C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: { BasedOnStyle: Google, IndentWidth: 4, ColumnLimit: 0, UseTab: Never, AllowShortIfStatementsOnASingleLine: false, AllowAllConstructorInitializersOnNextLine: false,  BreakConstructorInitializers: AfterColon, BreakBeforeBraces: Allman, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: InlineOnly, IndentPPDirectives: BeforeHash, AlignConsecutiveMacros: true, SortIncludes: false }
